title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file is saved without a file extension and is displayed with a generic file icon. When opening the file, it is treated as a plain text file.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed. The file icon should remain as the parent java file icon.
SR:
1. Open an existing java file.
2. Modify the file.
3. Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon. This will open a dialog.
4. Browse for a valid container location.
5. Type the filename without including the file extension (as it is not requested).
6. Click Ok.

Observe that the saved file in the Navigator has the specified location but is displayed without a file extension.
